data.eml:eml: A new species of Hetereleotris (Perciformes: Gobiidae) from Farasan Island (Red Sea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kovačić, Marcelo, Bogorodsky, Sergey V., Mal, Ahmad O. (2014): A new species of Hetereleotris (Perciformes: Gobiidae) from Farasan Island (Red Sea). Zootaxa 3846 (1): 119-126, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3846.1.6
